issue.title: [Release] Fix release script with llvm-7
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5010](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5010). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Source release script fails to compile gandiva because it requires llvm-7 and only llvm-6 is available in the ubuntu18 docker image.
